home.pageDescription: Apang Seva Kendra - Helping handicapped people with care and compassion

hero.title: Empowering Lives, Enabling Dreams
hero.subtitle: Providing support and care for handicapped individuals since 1995

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Mission & Vision
about.mission: To provide comprehensive support and rehabilitation services to handicapped individuals, enabling them to lead dignified and independent lives.
about.vision: A society where handicapped individuals have equal opportunities and are fully integrated into the mainstream.

donation.pageDescription: Support our cause by making a donation to help handicapped individuals
donation.title: Make a Donation
donation.description: Your contribution helps us provide better services to handicapped individuals and their families. All donations are eligible for tax exemption under Section 80G.

form.name: Full Name
form.agreeToTerms: I agree that this donation is non-refundable and I have read the terms and conditions

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number
errors.idInvalid: Please enter a valid ID number
errors.termsRequired: You must agree to the terms and conditions

section1.title: Donation Policy
section1.content: All donations made to Apang Seva Kendra are non-refundable. By making a donation, you acknowledge that you are making a voluntary contribution to support our cause and programs.

section2.title: Tax Benefits
section2.content: Donations made to Apang Seva Kendra are eligible for tax exemption under Section 80G of the Income Tax Act. A receipt will be provided for all donations.

section3.title: Use of Funds
section3.content: All donations will be used to support the programs and activities of Apang Seva Kendra for the benefit of handicapped individuals. We ensure transparency in the use of funds.

section4.title: Privacy Policy
section4.content: The personal information provided by donors will be kept confidential and will not be shared with any third party without consent, except as required by law.

processing.title: Processing Payment
processing.message: Please wait while we process your payment. Do not close or refresh this page.

success.title: Donation Successful!
success.message: Thank you for your generous donation. A receipt has been sent to your email address.

failure.title: Payment Failed
failure.message: We're sorry, but there was an issue processing your payment. Please try again or contact us for assistance.

receipt.retrieve: Looking for a past donation receipt?
receipt.retrieveMessage: Please enter your phone number, PAN, or Aadhar to retrieve your donation receipts.

inquiry.description: Have questions or need information? Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

success.title: Inquiry Submitted!
success.message: Thank you for your inquiry. Our team will review it and get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: Submission Failed
error.message: We're sorry, but there was an issue submitting your inquiry. Please try again or contact us directly.

about.title: About Apang Seva Kendra
about.description: Apang Seva Kendra is a non-profit organization dedicated to helping handicapped individuals lead dignified and independent lives through comprehensive support and rehabilitation services.
